summary: Rocky and Puddin' Head are waiting tables at an inn on Tortuga when a letter given them by Lady Jane for delivery to Martingale gets switched with a treasure map. Kidd and Bonney kidnap them to Skull Island to find said treasure.
cast: Bud Abbott|Lou Costello|Charles Laughton|Hillary Brooke|Bill Shirley|Leif Erickson|Fran Warren|George DeNormand|Lester Dorr|Frank Hagney|Kenner G. Kemp|Joe Kirk|Rex Lease|George Magrill|Boyd 'Red' Morgan|Leonard Mudie|Paul Newlan|Milicent Patrick|Suzanne Ridgway|Chuck Roberson|Syd Saylor|Carl Sklover|Max Wagner|Harry Wilson
title: Abbott y Costello contra el Capit√°n Kidd
